sqlQuery.name: OrgPageViewMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, organism, count, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM ( SELECT organism, count, start_date, end_date FROM sfischer.ORGANISMVIEWSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE start_date >= $$date.minDate$$ AND end_date <= $$date.maxDate$$ --AND project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) ) ORDER BY count desc,organism asc

sqlQuery.name: OrgParamCountMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, number_of_organisms, steps_count, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM ( SELECT project_id as project, number_of_organisms, steps_count, start_date, end_date FROM sfischer.ORGANISMSPERSTEP@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.minDate$$ AND end_date <= $$date.maxDate$$ ) ORDER BY number_of_organisms desc,steps_count desc,project_id asc

sqlQuery.name: OrgParamNameMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, organism, steps_count, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM ( SELECT project_id as project, organism, steps_count, start_date, end_date FROM sfischer.STEPSPERORGANISM@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.minDate$$ AND end_date <= $$date.maxDate$$ ) ORDER BY steps_count desc,organism asc,project_id asc

sqlQuery.name: GenePageTableMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project_id in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project_id end as project_id, record_class, table_name, count, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM ( SELECT project_id,RECORD_CLASS_URL_SEGMENT as record_class,table_name,count,start_date,end_date FROM sfischer.GENEPAGETABLESTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE start_date >= $$date.minDate$$ AND end_date <= $$date.maxDate$$ --AND project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) ) ORDER BY count desc,record_class asc,table_name asc,project_id asc

sqlQuery.name: ToolMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, tool,count,to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM ( SELECT project_id as project,tool,count,start_date,end_date FROM sfischer.TOOLSSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.minDate$$ AND end_date <= $$date.maxDate$$ ) ORDER BY count desc,tool asc,project_id asc

sqlQuery.name: SearchMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, record_name, singlesearch_name as search_name, steps_count, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM ( SELECT project_id as project, steps_count, start_date, end_date, SUBSTR(search_name, 1, INSTR(search_name, '.')-1) AS record_name, SUBSTR(search_name, INSTR(search_name, '.')+1) AS singlesearch_name FROM sfischer.SEARCHESSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND steps_count >= $$step_count_min$$ AND steps_count <= $$step_count_max$$ AND start_date >= $$date.minDate$$ AND end_date <= $$date.maxDate$$ ) ORDER BY steps_count desc,search_name asc,project_id asc
